name: 千雪
text:
こら、……ダメ
そんなとこ、くすぐったいでしょ……
trans:
Come on... That's no good. 
It tickles if you do that...

name: 千雪
text:
……きゃ……お腹がのっかって……
柔らかい……
trans:
...Kyaa... Climbing on my belly... 
You're so soft...

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe...

name: 甜花
text:
みんな、もふもふで、ぽかぽか……
いっしょにお昼寝……しよ……？
trans:
You're all so fluffy and warm... 
Shall we all... take a nap together...?

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ……
お口、もごもごしてるのかわいー
trans:
Ehehe... 
The way their mouths are chewing is so cuteee.

name: 甘奈
text: ずしっとするのも、なんだか幸せだね～
trans: It's kinda satisfying to feel their weight on me～

name: スタッフ
text:
千雪さん、頭に乗っかった子、
下ろして手に乗っけてもらってもいいですか？
trans:
Would it be okay if you took the one on your head 
and place it in your hands, Chiyuki-san?

name: 千雪
trans: O-Okay...

name: 千雪
text:
……あ、…………
頭、回り込まれちゃった……、ここかな……？
trans: ...Ah... It ran around my head... Is it somewhere here...?

name: スタッフ
text: そこですね！
trans: Yes, there it is!

name: スタッフ
text:
あー、指先だけじゃなくて、
そのまま手のひらできゅっと！　持っちゃってください！
trans:
Ah, squeeze it in the palm of your hands instead of 
just picking it up with your fingertips! 
Please hold it that way!

name: 千雪
text: きゅっと……！？
trans: Squeeze...!?

name: 千雪
text:
……えっと……やってみます……
指先……この辺かな……
trans:
...Umm... I'll try... I'll place my fingertips... 
Maybe somewhere around here...

name: 千雪
text: ……きゃっ、ごめんなさい……！
trans: ...Kyaa, I'm sorry about that...!

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……？
trans: Chiyuki-san...?

name: 甘奈
text:
もしかして、
ハムスターとかチンチラ……苦手？
trans:
Could it be you're not good with hamsters and 
chinchillas...?

name: 千雪
text: ち、違うの……大好き……！
trans: T-That's not it... I love them...!

name: 千雪
text:
でもね、
あんまり柔らかくて、ふわふわしてるから……
trans: But y'know, because they're so soft and fluffy...

name: 千雪
text:
力加減がわからなくて……
痛くしちゃわないか、心配になっちゃって……
trans:
I'm not really sure how much force I could use... 
I'm worried that they'll get hurt...

name: 千雪
text:
────よしよし……
痛くない……？
trans: ──There, there... does it not hurt...?

name: 甜花
text:
そういえば……千雪さん、
撮影前、チンチラさんにそーっと触って、笑ってた……
trans:
Come to think of it... Chiyuki-san was touching the 
chinchilla and smiling before the photoshoot...

name: スタッフ
text:
なるほど……
好きだからこそ……ってことですね！
trans: I see... So it's because you love them, right!

name: スタッフ
text:
わかりました！
じゃあ、今の表情で撮っちゃいましょう！
trans:
I got it! Then, let's take a photo with 
your expression right now!

name: 千雪
text: ……お願いします
trans: ...Please do.

name: 千雪
text:
無理した笑顔をファンのみなさんにお届けするのも、
なんだか、嘘になっちゃうみたいで……
trans:
It would somehow feel like I'm lying if I gave my fans 
a forced smile...

name: スタッフ
text:
わかります……私たちも
なるべくみなさんの魅力的な表情を撮りたいので
trans:
I understand... We also want to catch your charming 
expressions at their best.

name: 千雪
text:
わがままを言ってしまってすみません……
よろしくお願いします
trans:
Sorry for saying something so selfish... 
Please do go ahead.

name: スタッフ
text:
いえいえ……
むしろ、早めに言っていただけて助かりました
trans:
Don't apologise... 
We're glad you mentioned it early on instead.

name: スタッフ
text: 撮影再開しまーす！
trans: Let's resume the photoshoot!

name: 千雪
text:
甘奈ちゃん、甜花ちゃん、撮影お疲れ様
少し押しちゃってごめんなさい
trans:
Good work on the photoshoot, Amana-chan and 
Tenka-chan. Sorry I was being a little insistent 
earlier on.

name: 甘奈
text:
全然大丈夫だよ～
帰る前に、ケーキ食べる余裕あるくらいだもん☆
trans:
That's totally fine～ We even have some time to get 
cake before going back home ☆

name: 甜花
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah...!

name: 甜花
text:
それに……その分
いっぱい、もふもふできたから……
trans: Plus... I got to enjoy more fluffiness because of it...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ
ありがとう、甘奈ちゃん、甜花ちゃん
trans: Fufu, thanks, you two.

name: 千雪
text: 好きなのに、触るの怖いだなんて──
trans:
Even though I loved them, I was kinda afraid to touch 
them──

name: 千雪
text:
なんだか面倒くさいよなーって、
自分でも思うんだけど
trans: It somehow felt like I was being bothersome.

name: 甘奈
text:
苦手なのかな、って最初思っちゃってごめん……！
色んな好きがあるんだね
trans:
I'm sorry for thinking you disliked them at first...! 
I guess there are different kinds of "love" out there.

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……
trans: Y-Yeah...

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ、『色んな好き』かぁ…………
trans: Fufu, "different kinds of love", huh...

name: 千雪
text: 『ワルいけど好き』、とか？
trans: For instance, "loving it even though it's bad"?

name: 甘奈
text:
『ワルいけど好き』……かぁ……
例えばどんな？
trans: Loving it even though it's bad... huh... For example?

name: 甜花
text:
──あ
甜花、わかったかも……
trans: ──Ah. Tenka kinda gets it...

name: 甜花
text:
深夜アニメ見ながら……
お菓子食べる、とか……？
trans:
Something like watching a late night anime... 
while eating sweets...?

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、それはめっちゃワルいね～
けど、やりたくなっちゃうのもわかるっ
trans:
Ehehe, that really is bad behaviour～ 
But I kinda get why you'd wanna do it.

name: 甘奈
text: でも、そっか……
trans: But well, I see...

name: 甘奈
text:
それなら『怖いけど好き』とかもあるよね！
ホラー映画とか、怪談とか！
trans:
Then there's also "loving it even though it's scary"! 
Like with horror movies and ghost stories!

name: 千雪
text: うんうん
trans: That's right.

name: 千雪
text:
逃げなきゃ、って思ってるのに惹かれちゃう……
近づきたいのに触れない、の逆みたい……！
trans:
I'm drawn to it even though I feel like I should be 
running away... It's kinda like the opposite of wanting 
to get closer but not being able to touch it...!

name: 甘奈
text: そっか……
trans: I see...

name: 甘奈
text:
『好き』で
心と体があべこべになっちゃう事もあるんだ……
trans:
Our "love" can sometimes make our heart and body 
go in completely different directions...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ
『嫌いなのに好き』……みたいな
trans:
Fufu. There's also something like... "loving it even 
though I hate it".

name: 甘奈
text:
嫌いなのに好き……
それは本当に、想像つかないかも
trans:
Loving it even though I hate it... 
I really can't think of an example for that.

name: 甜花
text: 甜花も……わかんない……
trans: Tenka doesn't... know either...

name: 千雪
text: ──この間、観た映画のお話なんだけどね
trans: ──It's like the plot of the movie I saw the other day.

name: 千雪
text:
ヒロインの好きな人は、探検家なの
色々危ない場所に行くんだけど……
trans:
The person the heroine loves is an explorer that 
goes to various dangerous places...

name: 千雪
text:
いつもいつも、
心配で胸がつぶれそうになっちゃう彼女──
trans:
Her heart is always broken from worrying and 
worrying about them──

name: 千雪
text:
『こんな想いをさせる人は大嫌い！
いっそいなくなっちゃえばいいのに……！』
trans:
"I hate the kind of people that make me feel that 
way! It'd be better if they just didn't exist...!"

name: 千雪
text: ──なんて、言っちゃうの
trans: ──That was what she said.

name: 甘奈
text:
そ、そんなのダメだよ……！
だって、本当にその人がいなくなっちゃったら……
trans:
T-That's not right...! 
Because if that person was really gone...

name: 千雪
text:
うん……！
大好きなんだもん、いなくなっちゃっていいわけがないの
trans:
Yeah...! You love them so much that there's no way 
they should be gone.

name: 甜花
text: つ……つらい……
trans: H-How complicated...

name: 甘奈
text: けど……なんだか心が惹かれるお話……
trans: But... it's the kind of story I'd feel drawn to...

name: 千雪
text:
そう
だからこの映画は、『悲しいけど好き』
trans:
I agree. So this type of movie is an example of "loving 
it even though it's sad".

name: 甘奈
text:
『悲しいけど好き』かぁ……
う～ん！　やっぱり難しい……！
trans:
Loving it even though it's sad, huh... Hmm! 
Loving something really is complicated...!

name: 甜花
text: ね、難しい……
trans: C-Complicated...

name: 千雪
text: うん、難しい────
trans: Yeah, it's complicated──

name: 千雪
text:
──でも
難しいから、素敵なの
trans:
──But, it's only wonderful because it's complicated 
to begin with.

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ
trans: Fufu.
